query:
INSERT INTO recharges (
  customerId,
  amount,
  paymentMethod,
  status,
  transactionId,
  completedAt,
  createdAt
)
SELECT 
  480001,
  120,
  'pix',
  'completed',
  p.txid,
  NOW(),
  NOW()
FROM pix_transactions p
WHERE p.customerId = 480001 
  AND p.amount = 120
ORDER BY p.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 1

INSERT INTO recharges (
  customerId,
  amount,
  paymentMethod,
  status,
  transactionId,
  completedAt,
  createdAt
)
SELECT 
  480001,
  120,
  'pix',
  'completed',
  p.txid,
  NOW(),
  NOW()
FROM pix_transactions p
WHERE p.customerId = 480001 
  AND p.amount = 120
ORDER BY p.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 1
